Name: leukodystrophy
Definition: A cerebral degeneration characterized by dysfunction of the white matter of the brain.

Name: obsolete amino acid transport disease
Definition: A cerebral degeneration characterized by dysfunction of the white matter of the brain.

Name: cerebral lipidosis
Definition: A kidney disease characterized by the failure of the kidneys to adequately filter waste products from the blood.

Name: hydrocephalus
Definition: A cerebral degeneration characterized by an abnormal accumulation of cerebrospinal fluid in the ventricles of the brain

Name: senile degeneration of brain
Definition: An abnormal pupillary function characterized by a small pupil

Name: neuroaxonal dystrophy
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection
